item.title: How to Plot Maps and Paths in R
item.description: This blog is mainly about how to plot maps and paths using “ggplot2” and “maps”. We use the dataset in nasaweather package as examples. First example is to plot the world map and the paths of tropical storms. The second example is to plot the US map and the path of tropical storm Erin. The packages we use to plot the map are “maps” and ggplot2“. To process the data, we use package called”tidyverse"
